business.headline: Sensex ends 572 points lower, Nifty below 24,700; Kotak Bank down 7%The S&P BSE Sensex lost 572.07 points to end at 80,891.02, while the NSE Nifty50 was down by 156.10 points to close at 24,680.90.

5 IPOs worth Rs 7,000 crore to open for bidding this week. Check detailsThis week, five mainboard IPOs are opening for bidding: NSDL (National Securities Depository), M&B Engineering, Sri Lotus Developers & Realty, Aditya Infotech, and Laxmi India Finance.

Can opting for old regime help you save tax in FY25?Many believe that under the new tax regime, there is no tax on income up to Rs 12 lakh. However, this change will only take effect from April 1, 2025, and will apply to returns filed for the FY26.

Edelweiss' Radhika Gupta slams Dior for ignoring Indian artisans behind $200K coatThe luxury brand Dior showcased a $200K coat adorned with traditional Lucknowi 'mukaish' embroidery. While 12 Indian artisans spent 34 days crafting it, their names, and India's contribution, went unacknowledged.

Is TCS cutting jobs because of AI? Here's what CEO K Krithivasan saysTCS CEO K Krithivasan said that the company is still looking for highly skilled professionals, especially those who can support TCS's plans to expand into new technologies and markets.

What homeowners need to know about house property tax rules, explains tax advisorBuying a home comes with more than just EMIs and maintenance; it brings tax implications too. Sujit Bangar, Founder of TaaxBuddy.com, breaks down the key rules every homeowner should be aware of to avoid surprises during filing season.

New Income Tax Bill 2025: 3 key changes that could make ITR filing easierThe committee submitted its report to Parliament on 21 July. It's over 4,500 pages long and includes 285 suggestions to improve the draft New Income Tax Bill, 2025, which is meant to replace the old 1961 Act.
Have you got your BluSmart refund yet? It's been 90 daysBluSmart wallet refund: As July comes to an end, users say they have not received their money back and are struggling to even access the app.

Explained: Why Kotak Mahindra Bank share price fell over 6% todayThe decline came after the private lender posted a weaker-than-expected set of results for the April–June quarter. The stock decline comes in the wake of a 7% year-on-year drop in standalone net profit to Rs 3,282 crore, even though the bank reported steady growth in core lending activity.

Sensex opens over 300 points lower, Nifty below 24,800; Kotak Bank down 4%The S&P BSE Sensex was down by 225.28 points to 81,237.81, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 43.60 points to 24,793.40 as of 9:30 am.

Samsung to power Tesla's future with $16.5 billion chip deal: ReportThis long-term contract comes at a crucial time for Samsung. While the company is one of the world's biggest makers of memory chips, its foundry business, which produces chips for other companies, has struggled to keep up with demand and competition.

Bhavish Aggarwal's Krutrim lays off over 100 employees in fresh job cuts: ReportThe layoffs at Krutrim affected a large part of the firm's linguistics team, which had only recently joined the company.

entertainment.headline: Beyonce ends Cowboy Carter tour on historic note in Vegas. WatchSinger Beyonce brought the curtain down on her historic Cowboy Carter tour with a final performance in Las Vegas, featuring unexpected moments and special guest appearances.

Island actor Cha Eun-woo becomes real-life Jinu with Arden Cho in Free tributeK-pop stars Cha Eun-woo and Arden Cho embody Jinu and Rumi in an emotional 'KPop Demon Hunters' cover of 'Free'. The 'True Beauty' actor has enlisted himself for 2025 military service.

Farah introduced domestic nepotism with cook Dilip, says influencer. Director reactsInfluencer Freddy Birdy applauded filmmaker Farah Khan for her vlog series featuring her cook Dilip. He stated that Khan is promoting a new kind of "domestic nepotism". She responded to the praise in the comment section of the post.

Anirudh Ravichander's Chennai concert postponed to August 23 at a new venueComposer Anirudh Ravichander's concert was scheduled to take place on July 26 in Chennai, but was postponed one week before its scheduled date. The new concert date and venue have been listed on District app, although an official announcement is awaited.

Actors Jessica Alba-Danny Ramirez confirm romance with steamy kiss. Pics go viralHollywood actor Jessica Alba has seemingly confirmed her relationship with actor Danny Ramirez after they were seen sharing a passionate kiss outside his Los Angeles home. Pictures and videos of the duo have surfaced on X and Instagram.

Jennifer Lopez jokes about wardrobe malfunction, says she doesn't wear underwearJennifer Lopez shrugs off a major wardrobe malfunction during her concert, tossing aside her skirt and commanding the stage like the seasoned professional she is. Fans respond with enthusiasm.

Rohman Shawl celebrates 7 years of love and quiet friendship with Sushmita SenActor Rohman Shawl penned an emotional tribute to his relationship with Sushmita Sen, marking seven years since their journey began. In a heartfelt Instagram post, he reflected on how their bond transformed from romance to a 'quiet friendship'.

Big B shares Rs 20 Sholay ticket from 1975, thinks that's the cost of soft drink nowAmitabh Bachchan continued his Sunday tradition of meeting fans and shared reflections on creativity, excess, and nostalgia on his blog. He also shared a rare Rs 20 'Sholay' ticket from 1975, ahead of the film's 50th anniversary this August.

Elli AvrRam on Ashish Chanchalani's wouldn't date her remark: We share that banterActor Elli AvrRam addressed dating rumours with 'Chandaniya' co-star and influencer Ashish Chanchalani. She also addressed the backlash received by the influencer for saying he would never date her.

Washington Black review: A well-crafted show on racism, dreamers and scienceRelease Date:Wed Jul 23, 2025Washington Black series review: 'Washington Black' based on Esi Edugyan's novel of the same name, is available for streaming in India on JioHotstar. Is the drama-series worth your time? Here's our review.

Rana Daggubati, Vijay Sethupathi ideal to play Hiranyakashyap: Director Ashwin KumarDirector Ashwin Kumar, who recently helmed the mystical animation film 'Mahavatar Narsimha' opened up on which Indian actor, according to him, could play the demon king Hiranyakashyap. He also emphasised the need for an indigenous animation revolution in Indian storytelling.

The Sandman Season 2 Vol 2 review: Of one final dream, legacy and letting goRelease Date:Thu Jul 24, 2025In 'The Sandman Season 2 Vol 2', a dream unravels, and a legacy takes shape. In its most vulnerable moments, the series shows that even the endless has an end and a beginning. With visual grandeur and emotional weight, the final volume offers a poetic meditation of sorts.

Dibyendu Bhattacharya reacts to Chakda Xpress delay, calls it Anushka's bestActor Dibyendu Bhattacharya recently expressed confusion over the delay in the release of 'Chakda Xpress'. He also praised actor Anushka Sharma in a recent interview and called it her best performance to date.

Exclusive: Nandamuri Balakrishna's Akhanda 2 to be wrapped by August first weekNandamuri Balakrishna's 'Akhanda 2' is expected to be wrapped up by the first week of August. The film will be directed by Boyapati Srinu.

Karan Aujla announces new album P-Pop Culture, to release on August 22Punjabi music star Karan Aujla has announced the release of his album 'P-Pop Culture' on August 22, 2025, celebrating Punjabi heritage with a modern twist. The album aims to blend traditional Punjabi music with contemporary styles, highlighting the global influence of Punjabi Pop culture.

Sanjay Dutt opens up about bond with Salman Khan and Arshad Warsi: I can't detachSanjay Dutt talked about his friendship with Salman Khan and Arshad Warsi. He called Salman his brother and praised Arshad's comedy. He will soon be seen with Arshad in 'Welcome to the Jungle'.

Pride & Prejudice returns to theatres and it still says everything about love'Pride & Prejudice' re-release: Don't miss the iconic 2005 adaptation that defined the modern rom-coms and proved Jane Austen is still the queen of feminist love stories.

Sunny Deol meets Dalai Lama during unforgettable Ladakh trip with son RajveerBollywood actor Sunny Deol met the Dalai Lama during a trip to Ladakh with his son, Rajveer. The actor shared the encounter on social media, expressing gratitude and admiration.

Kajol channels K3G's Anjali at daughter Nysa's graduation. Video goes viralNysa Devgn and Raheema Rahman, daughters of Kajol-Ajay Devgn and AR Rahman, graduated from the Glion Institute of Higher Education in Switzerland. A video of Kajol cheering for Nysa during the ceremony caught fans' attention online.

general news.headline: Pahalgam attack mastermind among 3 terrorists killed in Op Mahadev: Sources Live UpdatesTop Lashkar commander Suleiman Shah, alias Hashim Musa, was the conspirator and executor of the Pahalgam attack, which left 26 civilians dead.

Live: Gaurav Gogoi says Amit Shah must take moral responsibility for J&K attackParliament Session 2025 Live Updates: After a week of disruptions, Parliament's Monsoon Session is witnessing a high-stakes debate, with the focus on the Pahalgam terror attack and Operation Sindoor — two issues deeply tied to national security and foreign policy. Both the ruling BJP-led NDA and the INDIA bloc are preparing for an intense face-off in the Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha. The Congress has issued a three-line whip, directing its Lok Sabha MPs to remain present in the House for the next three days. In a rare show of consensus, the two sides have agreed to a 16-hour debate in each House — though such sessions typically spill over beyond the allotted time. Stay tuned to IndiaToday.in as we bring you the latest updates.

Pahalgam attack mastermind was caught napping - Inside details of Op MahadevOperation Mahadev was the result of a 14-day-long pursuit and involved coordinated action by the Army, CRPF, and J&K Police, with efforts still ongoing to identify the terrorists and track down their remaining associates.

I miss you, mummy: Nimisha Priya's daughter seeks mercy in Yemen death row caseKerala nurse Nimisha Priya's thirteen-year-old Mishel travelled to Yemen with her father and a peace envoy to plead authorities for her mother's release. In the video, she can be seen telling, 'I love you, mummy, I miss you.'
Divya Deshmukh creates history, beats Koneru Humpy to win Women's World Cup 2025Divya Deshmukh created history as she defeated Koneru Humpy to win the Women's World Cup 2025 crown on Monday, July 28.

AI reason behind TCS laying off 12000 employees? CEO comments suggest yes and noThe message is loud and clear: quickly adapt to new technologies, will be critical for survival in the evolving industry. It is, as it has always been, all about survival of the fittest.

BJP vs BJP turns Constitution Club election into a thrillerA club election in the heart of New Delhi has turned into a BJP vs BJP thriller. After 25 years of uncontested reign as Secretary of the Constitution Club of India, BJP MP Rajiv Pratap Rudy is facing a surprise challenge from fellow party leader and former MP Sanjeev Balyan. The battle for the key post at the elite MPs' club has split loyalties across caste, region, and even party lines.

Why BJP old guard in Punjab, national leadership aren't buying the SAD reunion talkFor the BJP, the goal isn't just to win elections in the state but build a political identity that resonates with Sikhs independently of the Akali Dal

25-year-old Hyderabad man dies of heart attack while playing badmintonA 25-year-old man from Hyderabad's Khammam collapsed while playing shuttle. He was rushed to the hospital but declared dead on arrival. He worked for a private company in the city.

Karnataka professor faces inquiry as girl students allege hijab forced during tripAn Assistant Professor at the Central University of Karnataka allegedly compelled female students to wear the hijab during a university field trip, triggering a formal complaint and internal investigation.

Did sex-abuser Epstein introduce Melania to Trump? Musk-stoked fire spreadsUS President Donald Trump's biographer, Michael Wolff, has claimed that Jeffrey Epstein helped introduce Melania Trump to the former. This adds a new twist to the controversy sparked by Elon Musk's allegation that Trump appeared in the Epstein files. While Melania has refuted the allegations, Musk's claims have seemingly become a new political threat for Trump.

Op Sindoor not stopped under any pressure: Rajnath Singh snubs Trump claimDefence Minister Rajnath Singh underlined that the armed forces halted their strikes on Pakistan as the objectives of Operation Sindoor had been fully achieved.

Bengaluru women claim they were followed by group of men, record video from autoIn a video recap of the incident, the women described how the day began with a visit to Bengaluru's Rameswaram Cafe. As they later walked near JP Nagar, they noticed that some men, whom they had seen earlier at the cafe, appeared to be following them.

Kerala nuns arrested in Chhattisgarh for alleged conversion, Rahul Gandhi slams BJPTwo Catholic nuns from Kerala were arrested in Chhattisgarh over alleged conversion charges, sparking political outrage. Rahul Gandhi and Kerala Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan demanded their release, calling it persecution of minorities under BJP rule.

What is wrong? Supreme Court pulls up IIT Kharagpur over student suicidesExpressing deep concern over the rising number of student suicides at IIT Kharagpur and Sharda University, the Supreme Court wondered whether the institutions had taken any steps to address the issue.

Thailand, Cambodia agree to immediate ceasefire after days of deadly border clashesMalaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim announced that Thailand and Cambodia have agreed to an immediate and unconditional ceasefire to end their border conflict, which has been raging for five days.

Manish Malhotra broke from the fashion week script, and it workedIt wasn't the conventional showcase, as is the ritual for most designers. Manish Malhotra eschewed the traditional runway format and hosted an exclusive couture party at the Taj Palace in New Delhi on July 26.

With mother as shield and skin, 8-month-old Air India crash victim survivesEight-month-old Dhyaansh is the youngest survivor of the June 12 Air India crash. The infant's mother, Manisha Kachhadiya, shielded him as fire engulfed BJ Medical College's residential complex as the IC171 crashed into the building. As both battled burns, Manisha donated her skin to Dhyaansh for grafting. Now, mother and son have been discharged from the hospital.

RJD MLA's Panchayat-style threat gets Bihar Sachiv's 'not scared of you' responseAn audio clip, allegedly featuring RJD MLA Bhai Virendra, has gone viral, in which he is heard threatening a panchayat secretary who failed to recognise him during a call about a death certificate request.

Shashi Tharoor declined to speak on Op Sindoor, refused to toe party line: SourcesShashi Tharoor declined to take part in the Operation Sindoor discussion as he could not align with the party's current line of criticism against the government over the operation.

Is my child autistic? The new-age panic that's robbing kids of just being kidsParents today are more watchful than ever, sometimes too much. Normal toddler quirks are being mistaken for signs of serious disorders.

'Dog Babu', son of 'Kutta Babu', gets key Bihar certificate amid voter roll rowA digitally signed residence certificate in the name of 'Dog Babu', complete with canine photo and names of canine parents, has emerged from Bihar's Masaurhi.

Demand for Sikh regiment in British Army peaks, minister says open to ideaThe demand for a Sikh regiment within the British Army, which also has a Gurkha Regiment, has gained traction. British Defence Minister Vernon Rodney Coaker has expressed openness to discussing the idea with Labour peer Kuldip Singh Sahota, who has raised the demand.

India refuse early draw in Manchester, Stokes explodes. Who was right?India vs England: Shubman Gill's India pulled off a heroic draw in the Manchester Test match. Ravindra Jadeja got into a verbal tussle with Ben Stokes in the late hours of the final day.

Beyonce ends Cowboy Carter tour on historic note in Vegas. WatchSinger Beyonce brought the curtain down on her historic Cowboy Carter tour with a final performance in Las Vegas, featuring unexpected moments and special guest appearances.

Island actor Cha Eun-woo becomes real-life Jinu with Arden Cho in Free tributeK-pop stars Cha Eun-woo and Arden Cho embody Jinu and Rumi in an emotional 'KPop Demon Hunters' cover of 'Free'. The 'True Beauty' actor has enlisted himself for 2025 military service.

He stated that Khan is promoting a new kind of "domestic nepotism". She responded to the praise in the comment section of the post.

Anirudh Ravichander's Chennai concert postponed to August 23 at a new venueComposer Anirudh Ravichander's concert was scheduled to take place on July 26 in Chennai, but was postponed one week before its scheduled date. The new concert date and venue have been listed on District app, although an official announcement is awaited.

sports.headline: Divya Deshmukh creates history, beats Koneru Humpy to win Women's World Cup 2025Divya Deshmukh created history as she defeated Koneru Humpy to win the Women's World Cup 2025 crown on Monday, July 28.

Should India push Jasprit Bumrah to play 5th Test vs England?India vs England: Jasprit Bumrah has already played his promised 3 Tests in England. Should he push for one more with the series on the line?

Indian Legends applaud resilient India fightback in Manchester Test drawIndia's remarkable fightback at Old Trafford has kept the five-match Test series alive. With standout performances from KL Rahul, Shubman Gill, Ravindra Jadeja, and Washington Sundar, the team displayed exceptional resilience, drawing praise from cricketing legends ahead of the series decider.
ENG vs IND: England add all-rounder to squad for Oval Test against IndiaEngland announced their squad for the Oval Test and decided to add Jamie Overton to the side for the upcoming clash.

You expect him to take 10 wickets? Kapil Dev defends Anshul Kamboj after debutKapil Dev has jumped to the defence of young pacer Anshul Kamboj after his lacklustre debut in the Manchester Test for India. Kamboj failed to make a mark in his first match in India colours.

Want a hundred against Brook? Of course! Ashwin slams Stokes for 4th Test fiascoR Ashwin slammed Ben Stokes and England for the fiasco they created by trying to end the Manchester Test early and deny Ravindra Jadeja and Washington Sundar hundreds on Sunday, July 27.

Watch Piastri's audacious overtake on Norris that won him Belgian GPOscar Piastri won the rain-delayed Belgian Grand Prix with a bold move on teammate Lando Norris. This victory extends his championship lead and adds to McLaren's dominance this season.

Fight for entire day: Sundar on mantra after brave hundred in 4th Test drawWashington Sundar revealed his mantra while batting on Day 5 when he scored a brave hundred in the Manchester Test. Sundar played a valiant role in securing the draw in the 4th Test.

Gambhir bats for injury replacements, Ben Stokes slams ridiculous ideaEngland captain Ben Stokes has voiced strong opposition to injury replacements in Test cricket. The debate follows Rishabh Pant's injury and contrasting views from India's coach Gautam Gambhir.

Injured Pant sends parting message to Team India after heroic Manchester drawRishabh Pant sent a parting message to the Indian team after their heroic draw in the Manchester Test. Pant showed grit and fought through pain to score a valiant fifty in the first innings of the fourth Test.

Manchester Test: A draw that felt like a winFrom 0 for 2 to 425 for 4 in the second innings, India turned what looked a defeat into a stirring draw in Manchester. A performance built on grit and defiance, it felt like a win and a momentum shift before the Oval finale.

Fight for entire day: Sundar on mantra after brave hundred in 4th Test drawWashington Sundar revealed his mantra while batting on Day 5 when he scored a brave hundred in the Manchester Test. Sundar played a valiant role in securing the draw in the 4th Test.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
